ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.label: Proceeds from Sale of Treasury Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

RelatedPartyDepositLiabilities.label: Related Party Deposit Liabilities
RelatedPartyDepositLiabilities.description: Amount of deposits held by the entity for a related party (entity, shareholder, employee).

RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.label: Payments of FHLBank Borrowings, Financing Activities
RepaymentsOfFederalHomeLoanBankBorrowing.description: Amount of cash outflow for repayment of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) borrowing, classified as financing activity.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

SharesPaidForTaxWithholdingForShareBased.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Shares Withheld for Tax Withholding Obligation
SharesPaidForTaxWithholdingForShareBased.description: Number of shares used to settle grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.label: State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.description: Amount of state and local current and deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.description: The number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

SuppliesAndPostageExpense.label: Supplies and Postage Expense
SuppliesAndPostageExpense.description: The aggregate amount of expenses directly related to the supplies and postage.

TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnearnedESOPShares.label: Unearned ESOP Shares
UnearnedESOPShares.description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WarehouseAgreementBorrowings.label: Warehouse Agreement Borrowings
WarehouseAgreementBorrowings.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the outstanding short-term borrowings under a revolving line of credit used by mortgage bankers to finance the origination or purchase of loans.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesEmployeeSto.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Shares Not Committed to be Released
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP) shares that have not been committed to be released determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: Effective interest rate for the funds borrowed under the debt agreement considering interest compounding and original issue discount or premium.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Accumulated Loss
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Amount of accumulated unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous loss position for 12 months or longer.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Continuous Unrealized Loss Position, 12 Months or Longer, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesContinuousUnreal.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), in continuous unrealized loss position for 12 months or longer.

LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount.description: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Liability, Transfers Into Level 3
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a liability into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Liability, Transfers out of Level 3
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as a liability out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset Transfers Into Level 3
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of transfer of financial instrument classified as an asset into level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Transfers out of Level 3
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of transfers of financial instrument classified as an asset out of level 3 of the fair value hierarchy.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Accumulated Unrecognized Gain
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesAccumulatedUnrec.description: Amount of accumulated unrecognized gain on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPreferredStockAndP.description: Proceeds from issuance of capital stock which provides for a specific dividend that is paid to the shareholders before any dividends to common stockholders and which takes precedence over common stockholders in the event of liquidation.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Average Interest Rate, after Year Five
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Weighted average interest rate of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, after Year Five
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Grants in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of grants made during the period on other than stock (or unit) option plans (for example, phantom stock or unit plan, stock or unit appreciation rights plan, performance target plan).

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advance, Maturity, Year Three
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesMaturitiesSum.description: Amount of advance from Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.label: Financing Receivable, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.description: Amount of financing receivable 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Aggregate value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period.
